issue.title: duration streaming precondition should be a SFINAE condition

blockquote.p: Requires: Rep is an integral type whose integer conversion rank () is greater than or equal to that of short, or a floating point type. charT is char or wchar_t.

discussion.p: Since the function's description lacks a Throws: element, it is UB to call it if its precondition isn't met. I think the intention was to make this a compile-time error, since all the information to make it so is available at compile-time.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4750.

blockquote.p: -1- RequiresRemarks: This function shall not participate in overload resolution unless Rep is an integral type whose integer conversion rank () is greater than or equal to that of short, or a floating point type., and charT is char or wchar_t.
